channel.title: Adding an Azure DevOps code server on
channel.description: Recent content in Adding an Azure DevOps code server on

item.title: Generate a personal access token (PAT) in Azure DevOps
item.description: Creating an Azure DevOps personal access token # In order for BluBracket to access information within a given Azure DevOps organization or repository, an access token must be set in the tenant. Generating a token # Follow the Azure DevOps documentation to create a PAT . Entering your personal access token # After generating your personal access token, it needs to be entered into BluBracket.
